summary: Timeline_24 follows a journey through PTSD treatment with increasing use of coping strategies.

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. set healthy boundaries I deserve to get better Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm a burden to everyone But I worked through it using my tools. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. Everyone would be better off without me I haven't showered in a week Went outside for 10 minutes. asked for support Called a friend. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I feel completely hopeless Nobody understands what I'm going through. I gave up trying Decided to join a support group. went for a walk to clear my head Met some people who actually get it. I'm being patient with myself
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I'm disgusting I can't focus on anything. I pushed everyone away My therapist recommended meditation so I asked for support and Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I'm a burden to everyone Nobody understands what I'm going through. I'm losing my mind Decided to join a support group. took my medication as prescribed Met some people who actually get it. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm disgusting I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I hurt myself again But I've been practicing the breathing exercises tried a new coping mechanism and it's starting to help. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. Everyone would be better off without me I don't feel like myself anymore. I pushed everyone away Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. practiced my coping strategies Keeping a mood journal to track changes. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I'm worthless and pathetic I've been having suicidal thoughts Started using the coping strategies from therapy. practiced my coping strategies I'm trying to be patient with myself. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I hate myself so much I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I've been having suicidal thoughts Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. joined a support group Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I'm a burden to everyone I hurt myself again Forced myself to go for a walk today reached out for help and called my sister. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I'm worthless and pathetic I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I can't see a future for myself Today though, I managed to talked to a friend about what I'm going through which is a small victory.
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts
